MateuszHerych.bio: Mateusz works as a Head of Mobile Platforms at IG - originally coming from Krakow, Poland, currently living in London. He is a member of the Google Developer Expert program on Android, and a long-time GDG Krakow organizer. Father of twins, an avid fan of rail transportation and football.
MateuszHerych.name: Mateusz Herych
MateuszHerych.title: Android GDE
